history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How? <break strength='strong'/>
USER walking
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER Allegheny County Courthouse
TTS Okay, going to allegheny county courthouse. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Pittsburgh Paints Arena
TTS Okay, leaving from ppg paints arena. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:25 am.
TTS <speak>pause</speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok</speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is the route in Wheelchair and Scooter User mode, to hear the route in Bind or Visually Impaired mode, please say ALTERNATE ROUTE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Start at Location 1. Go west on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Bear right on ROSS STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Bear left on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left on ROSS STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
